languages.text: "Доверяю ли я Двойняшкам-Ловкачам? Помилуй Великий! Проходимцы Футфола не зря прозвали подобным образом сих бесноватых ашмагов, ибо за их "ловкостью" скрываются вещи куда более интригующие, чем могли бы подумать граждане совестливые и прямодушные". {n}Воспоминания о товарищах заставляют глаза торговки сиять чуть ярче обычного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Доверяю ли я Двойняшкам-Ловкачам? Помилуй Великий! Проходимцы Футфола не зря прозвали подобным образом сих бесноватых ашмагов, ибо за их "ловкостью" скрываются вещи куда более интригующие, чем могли бы подумать граждане совестливые и прямодушные". {n}Воспоминания о товарищах заставляют глаза торговки сиять чуть ярче обычного.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Do I trust the Trickster Twins? By the Exalted One, no! The underhanded rogues of Footfall came up with that name for a reason. The tricks of those frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than the honest and law-abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow Cold Traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Доверяю ли я Двойняшкам-Ловкачам? Помилуй Великий! Проходимцы Футфола не зря прозвали подобным образом сих бесноватых ашмагов, ибо за их "ловкостью" скрываются вещи куда более интригующие, чем могли бы подумать граждане совестливые и прямодушные". {n}Воспоминания о товарищах заставляют глаза торговки сиять чуть ярче обычного.{/n}

The tricks of these frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than what the honest and law abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow cold traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我相不相信骗术师双胞胎？至高无上的神皇在上啊，我当然不相信了！落脚港那群恶棍之所以这么称呼他们，不是没有原因的。那些丧心病狂的坏种，他们想出来的那些阴谋诡计，根本不是帝国诚实守法的臣民们能想象得到的东西。”{n}一提到她的冷市商人伙伴，婕伊的眼睛就变得更亮了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do I trust the Trickster Twins? By the Exalted One, no! The underhanded rogues of Footfall came up with that name for a reason. The tricks of those frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than the honest and law-abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow Cold Traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我相不相信骗术师双胞胎？至高无上的神皇在上啊，我当然不相信了！落脚港那群恶棍之所以这么称呼他们，不是没有原因的。那些丧心病狂的坏家伙，他们想出来的那些阴谋诡计，根本不是帝国诚实守法的臣民们能想象得到的东西。”{n}一提到她的冷市商人伙伴，婕伊的眼睛就变得更亮了。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do I trust the Trickster Twins? By the Exalted One, no! The underhanded rogues of Footfall came up with that name for a reason. The tricks of those frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than the honest and law-abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow Cold Traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Que si confío en los Mellizos Embusteros? ¡Por el Exaltado, no! Los canallas traicioneros de Paso eligieron ese nombre por un motivo. Los trucos de esos ashmags locos van mucho más allá de lo que los súbditos honrados y responsables del Imperium puedan imaginar». {n}Mencionar a sus colegas del Comercio Frío hace que los ojos de Jae brillen con más fuerza de la habitual.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do I trust the Trickster Twins? By the Exalted One, no! The underhanded rogues of Footfall came up with that name for a reason. The tricks of those frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than the honest and law-abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow Cold Traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Que si confío en los Mellizos Embusteros? ¡Por el Exaltado, no! Los canallas traicioneros de Paso eligieron ese nombre por un motivo. Los trucos de esos ashmags locos van mucho más allá de lo que los súbditos honrados y responsables del Imperium puedan imaginar». {n}Mencionar a sus colegas del Comercio Frío hace que los ojos de Jae brillen con más fuerza de la habitual.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「トリックスターの双子は信用できると思う？エグザルテッド・ワンに誓って、ノーよ！フットフォールの悪党どもがその名前を思いついたのには理由がある。熱狂的なアッシュマグの手口は、帝国の正直で遵法的な臣民が想像するよりもはるかに興味をそそるものばかりよ」{n}闇商人の仲間の話になると、ジェイの目はいつもより少し輝きを増す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do I trust the Trickster Twins? By the Exalted One, no! The underhanded rogues of Footfall came up with that name for a reason. The tricks of those frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than the honest and law-abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow Cold Traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「トリックスターの双子は信用できると思う？エグザルテッド・ワンに誓って、ノーよ！フットフォールの悪党どもがその名前を思いついたのには理由がある。熱狂的なアッシュマグの手口は、帝国の正直で遵法的な臣民が想像するよりもはるかに興味をそそるものばかりよ」{n}闇商人の仲間の話になると、ジェイの目はいつもより少し輝きを増す。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ob ich den Trickster-Zwillingen vertraue? Beim Erhabenen, nein! Die hinterhältigen Gauner von Footfall haben sich den Namen nicht ohne Grund einfallen lassen. Bei den Tricks dieser wahnsinnigen Ashmag geht es stets um Dinge, die viel faszinierender sind, als es sich die ehrlichen und gesetzestreuen Untertanen des Imperiums vorstellen können." {n}Die Erwähnung ihrer Kalthandel-Kollegen lässt Jaes Augen ein wenig heller strahlen als sonst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do I trust the Trickster Twins? By the Exalted One, no! The underhanded rogues of Footfall came up with that name for a reason. The tricks of those frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than the honest and law-abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow Cold Traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ob ich den Trickster-Zwillingen vertraue? Beim Erhabenen, nein! Die hinterhältigen Gauner von Footfall haben sich den Namen nicht ohne Grund einfallen lassen. Bei den Tricks dieser wahnsinnigen Ashmag geht es stets um Dinge, die viel faszinierender sind, als es sich die ehrlichen und gesetzestreuen Untertanen des Imperiums vorstellen können." {n}Die Erwähnung ihrer Kalthandel-Kollegen lässt Jaes Augen ein wenig heller strahlen als sonst.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous me demandez si je fais confiance aux jumeaux, les Roublards ? Par l'Exalté, bien sûr que non ! Si les crapules de Castel leur ont donné ce surnom, ce n'est pas par hasard. Ces ashmags acharnés sont capables de mettre au point des stratagèmes qui dépassent l'imagination des sujets honnêtes de l'Imperium. » {n}Les yeux de Jae brillent un peu plus lorsqu'elle parle de ses collègues du Commerce Froid.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do I trust the Trickster Twins? By the Exalted One, no! The underhanded rogues of Footfall came up with that name for a reason. The tricks of those frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than the honest and law-abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow Cold Traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous me demandez si je fais confiance aux jumeaux, les Roublards ? Par l'Exalté, bien sûr que non ! Si les crapules de Castel leur ont donné ce surnom, ce n'est pas par hasard. Ces ashmags acharnés sont capables de mettre au point des stratagèmes qui dépassent l'imagination des sujets honnêtes de l'Imperium. » {n}Les yeux de Jae brillent un peu plus lorsqu'elle parle de ses collègues du Commerce Froid.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Düzenbaz İkizler'e güveniyor muyum? Görkemli aşkına, tabii ki hayır! Binlimanlı dümenci haydutlar, o ikisine bu ismi boşuna takmadı. O kafayı yemiş külboğazların numaraları, dürüst ve kanunlara uyan İmparatorluk tebaasının hayal gücünü aşar." {n}Diğer Soğuk Tacirlerin adı anılınca Jae'ın gözleri her zamankinden biraz daha fazla parlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do I trust the Trickster Twins? By the Exalted One, no! The underhanded rogues of Footfall came up with that name for a reason. The tricks of those frenzied ashmags are all about things far more intriguing than the honest and law-abiding subjects of the Imperium can imagine." {n}The mention of her fellow Cold Traders makes Jae's eyes shine a bit brighter than usual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Düzenbaz İkizlere güveniyor muyum mu? Görkemli adına, tabii ki hayır! Binliman'ın o dümenci haydutları kendilerine o ismi boşuna takmadılar. O kafayı yemiş külboğazların oyunları, İmparatorluk'un dürüst ve kanunlara saygılı tebaanın hayal edebileceklerinin çok ötesindeki şeylerle ilgilidir." {n}Diğer Soğuk Tacirlerin adını anmak, Jae'ın gözlerinin her zamankinden biraz daha fazla parlamasına neden oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
